students.name: Izuku Midoriya
students.quirk_japanese: ワン・フォー・オール
students.quirk_description: A transferable Quirk that stockpiles power and grants immense strength, speed, stamina, and durability.

students.name: Katsuki Bakugo
students.quirk_description: Secretes sweat with nitroglycerin-like properties from his hands and can ignite it on command to produce powerful explosions.

students.name: Ochaco Uraraka
students.quirk_description: She can make any object weightless by touching them with the pads on her fingertips. Overuse of her Quirk will cause her to suffer from severe nausea.

students.name: Tenya Ida
students.quirk_description: Super speed and superhuman kicking strength via jet engines in his calves.

students.name: Shoto Todoroki
students.quirk_description: Enables him to generate ice from the right side of his body and fire from the left.

students.name: Eijiro Kirishima
students.quirk_description: Enables him to harden his body.

students.name: Tsuyu Asui
students.quirk_description: Gives her frog-like abilities such as enhanced swimming and jumping, sticking to and climbing up walls, and a long prehensile tongue.

students.name: Momo Yaoyorozu
students.quirk_description: Enables her the ability to create any non-biological object from the lipids stored in her body as long as she knows its molecular structure.

students.name: Minoru Mineta
students.quirk_description: He grows many small, highly adhesive grape-like balls on his head that he can remove and use as weapons. He can also use the balls as his personal trampolines, as they bounce off his body instead of sticking to him.

students.name: Denki Kaminari
students.quirk_description: Enables him the ability to absorb and emit electricity.

students.name: Kyoka Jiro
students.quirk_description: Enables her to plug her extremely long earlobes into objects to hear minuscule sounds and vibrations from her surroundings or channel the sound of her own heartbeat in the form of sonic attacks.

students.name: Fumikage Tokoyami
students.quirk_description: Enables him to manifest and control a sentient shadow monster from his body that grows more powerful in the dark.

students.name: Mina Ashido
students.quirk_description: Enables her to secrete an acidic fluid from her body.

students.name: Yuga Aoyama
students.quirk_description: Enables him to fire a laser blast from his belly button.

students.name: Mezo Shoji
students.quirk_description: Enables him to grow individual body organs at the tips of the four webbed tentacles growing from his shoulders.

students.name: Hanta Sero
students.quirk_description: Enables him to shoot cellophane tape from the tape dispenser-like organs on his elbows.

students.name: Mashirao Ojiro
students.quirk_description: Grants him a thick prehensile tail.

students.name: Koji Koda
students.quirk_description: Allows him to talk to animals.

students.name: Rikido Sato
students.quirk_description: Enhances his physical strength at the cost of his cognitive functions whenever he consumes sugar.

students.name: Toru Hagakure
students.quirk_description: Makes her entire body invisible and gives her the ability to refract light.

students.name: Neito Monoma
students.quirk_description: Allows him to temporarily duplicate and use another person's Quirk by simply touching them. He can store four Quirks, but can only activate one at a time.

students.name: Itsuka Kendo
students.quirk_description: Enables her to enlarge her fists.

students.name: Ibara Shiozaki
students.quirk_description: Gives her a head of vines instead of hair that she can extend and use in combat.

students.name: Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu
students.quirk_description: Gives him the ability to turn his skin to steel.

students.name: Juzo Honenuki
students.quirk_description: Enables him to soften anything that he touches.

students.name: Nirengeki Shoda
students.quirk_description: At the site of an initial impact he can create a second impact, which he can activate anytime.

students.name: Yosetsu Awase
students.quirk_description: Allows him to physically connect anything he touches.

students.name: Kosei Tsuburaba
students.quirk_description: Enables him to solidify air into a wall or platform.

students.name: Sen Kaibara
students.quirk_description: Allows him to rotate any part of his body at incredibly high speeds, similarly to a drill.

students.name: Kojiro Bondo
students.quirk_description: Enables him to excrete a glue-like liquid from seven eyeholes on his glue dispenser-shaped head.

students.name: Reiko Yanagi
students.quirk_description: Grants her the ability to telekinetically manipulate objects around her.

students.name: Jurota Shishida
students.quirk_description: Grants him the ability to transform into a monstrous beast.

students.name: Yui Kodai
students.quirk_description: Enables her to change the size of any object she interacts with.

students.name: Hiryu Rin
students.quirk_description: Enables him to form scales on his body for combat and other purposes. He can also shoot the scales.

students.name: Kinoko Komori
students.quirk_description: Grants her the ability to create spores from her cells, allowing her to grow mushrooms from the surfaces of her surroundings.

students.name: Togaru Kamakiri
students.quirk_description: Grants him the ability to produce large, sharp blades from all over his body.

students.name: Pony Tsunotori
students.quirk_description: Allows her to grow effectively gazelle-like horns on her head and control them.

students.name: Setsuna Tokage
students.quirk_description: Allows her to split her body into several pieces and control them telekinetically.

students.name: Shihai Kuroiro
students.quirk_description: Grants him the ability to merge into anything that is black-colored and control it.

students.name: Manga Fukidashi
students.quirk_description: Allows him to manifest different onomatopoeias into reality in the form of katakana.

students.name: Mei Hatsume
students.quirk_description: Allows her to zoom her vision to up to 5 kilometers.

students.name: Hitoshi Shinso
students.quirk_description: Allows him to control those who answer his questions.
students.class: Origionally - General Course. Transfered to - Hero Course

students.name: Mirio Togata
students.quirk_description: Allows him to phase his body through anything solid, including the ground itself.

students.name: Tamaki Amajiki
students.quirk_description: Gives him the characteristics and abilities of anything he eats.

students.name: Nejire Hado
students.quirk_description: Allows her to convert her stamina into energy and release it in the form of spiral shockwaves.

villains.name: Tenko Shimura
villains.quirk_description: Enables him to disintegrate whatever he touches with his fingers and anything connected to it.

villains.name: Shigaraki
villains.quirk_japanese: オール・フォー・ワン
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to both steal and bestow Quirks, as well as wield multiple Quirks at once.

villains.name: Oboro Shirakumo
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to generate a dark purple fog from his body and use it to create weaponized long-ranged portals.

villains.name: Dr. Kyudai Garaki
villains.name_japanese: 殻木 球大 博士
villains.quirk_description: Grants him an extended lifespan and makes him look younger than he actually is.

villains.name: Gigantomachia
villains.quirk_description: An immensely powerful kaiju-sized villain who has multiple Quirks and is deeply loyal to All For One.

villains.name: Kagero Okuta
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to cause minor amnesia to a person by making physical contact with their head.

villains.name: Toya Todoroki
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to generate and control a stronger variant of Endeavor's Hellflame, possessing a high cold resistance but unable to withstand his own flames for a prolonged amount of time.

villains.name: Himiko Toga
villains.quirk_description: She is able to assume the physical appearance of another after drinking  that person's blood. The quirk later evolved to allow her to use the Quirk of whoever she turns into.

villains.name: Jin Bubaigawara
villains.quirk_description: The Quirk allows him to create copies of anything he touches, including himself once overcoming his personal issues.

villains.name: Atsuhiro Sako
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to instantly shrink down anything in a spherical area into a small marble without actually damaging it.

villains.name: Shuichi Iguchi
villains.quirk_description: Gives him the appearance and abilities of a gecko.

villains.name: Kenji Hikiishi
villains.quirk_description: Allows her to magnetize others within an area around herself.

villains.name: Goto Imatsuji
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to enlarge the muscle fibers beneath his skin, granting him immense strength, speed, stamina, and durability.

villains.name: Mustard
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to generate vast amounts of a toxic sleeping gas from his body, he is not immune to his own Quirk.

villains.name: Moonfish
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to lengthen, sharpen, and manipulate his teeth into webs of powerful blades.

villains.name: Hood
villains.quirk_description: A highly advanced and sentient Nomu made from an unnamed street punk who attacks Endeavor and Hawks in Kyushu. Hood openly showed some signs of obedience and loyalty to his master. He spoke with a stutter and broken grammar.ep 87 He is revealed to possess six different Quirks and is able to severely injure Endeavor, before the latter incinerates him with his ultimate super move Prominence Burn.

villains.name: Johnny
villains.quirk_description: A small Nomu with a cable-like bottom that is owned by Daruma and has the ability to teleport people by spraying a goo that makes its recipient a medium for the teleportation.

villains.name: Rikiya Yotsubashi
villains.quirk_description: Grants him the ability to convert his stress and anger into raw power, which turns him into a hulking monster and significantly enhances his strength.

villains.name: Koku Hanabata
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to boost the physical and mental abilities of his subordinates from his voice.

villains.name: Tomoyasu Chikazoku
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to take a human-sized object and turn it into an exact lookalike of any given person, which he can then control like a puppet.

villains.name: Chitose Kizuki
villains.quirk_description: Allows her to turn anything she touches into a bomb.

villains.name: Geten
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to freely control all nearby ice.

villains.name: Tatsuyuki Tokoname
villains.quirk_description: Possesses an unnamed sliding Quirk.

villains.name: Kai Chisaki
villains.quirk_description: enables him to disassemble anything he touches, as well as reassemble it in any configuration he desires. He can also use his Quirk to fuse himself with others, which enables him to use their Quirks, and heal himself of any injuries he sustains in combat.

villains.name: Hari Kurono
villains.quirk_description: Enables him to slow down the movements of anything he hits with his clock-hand-like hair.

villains.name: Joi Irinaka
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to transfer his own body and mind into solid objects, which he can then manipulate and control like his actual body.

villains.name: Shin Nemoto
villains.quirk_description: Enables him to force people to answer his questions truthfully.
villains.affiliation: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

villains.name: Rikiya Katsukame
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to absorb the stamina of his adversaries, simultaneously strengthening himself and weakening his opponents.
villains.affiliation: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

villains.name: Toya Setsuno
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to telekinetically steal any objects that his target possesses.
villains.affiliation: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

villains.name: Yu Hojo
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to grow sharp, durable crystals all over his body.
villains.affiliation: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

villains.name: Soramitsu Tabe
villains.quirk_description: Allows his teeth to easily chew through and consume any solid substance, no matter how durable it is.
villains.affiliation: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

villains.name: Kendo Rappa
villains.quirk_description: Enables him to rotate his shoulders at extreme speeds, allowing him to attack his targets with a near-endless barrage of bullet punches.
villains.affiliation: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

villains.name: Hekiji Tengai
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to create a dome-shaped forcefield around himself and his allies.
villains.affiliation: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

villains.name: Deidoro Sakaki
villains.quirk_description: Enables him to subject anyone near him to severe dizziness, knocking off their sense of balance and putting them in a state similar to being drunk.
villains.affiliation: Shie Hassaikai - One of the Eight Bullets

villains.name: Chizome Akaguro
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to paralyze a person for a certain period of time by ingesting their blood.

villains.name: Danjuro Tobita
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to bestow the property of elasticity to anything he touches.

villains.name: Manami Aiba
villains.quirk_description: Allows her to boost the power of whomever she loves the most by declaring her love to them (although she is only able to activate her Quirk once a day).

villains.name: Ending
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to control and manipulate any lane lines that are painted on the road.

villains.name: Kaina Tsutsumi
villains.quirk_description: Grants her the ability to transform her right forearm into a rifle at will. She uses her hair to create ammunition.

villains.name: Wolfram
villains.quirk_japanese: 金属操作 and 筋肉増強
villains.quirk_description: Enables him to reshape and manipulate all types of metal. All For One also gave Wolfram the Quirk, Muscle Augmentation that enables him to increase his muscle mass.

villains.name: Nine
villains.quirk_description: Enables him to control the weather. In addition, Nine can also steal the Quirks of anyone and constant use of them can exhaust him, causing Nine to wear a special life-support system that pumps special drugs in him.

villains.name: Flect Turn
villains.quirk_description: Enables him to reflect all types of energy, including any attack and its effects, back to the user; as well as storing it for later.

villains.name: Beros
villains.quirk_description: Allows her to morph her left hand into a bow, as well as being able to control the object she shoots out of it. However, she cannot create her own ammunition.

villains.name: Sidero
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to create iron balls (of which he can also control the size of, to an extent) and shoot them from his knuckles.

villains.name: Serpenters
villains.quirk_description: A villain duo made up of two twin brothers - Their Quirk allows each of them to manifest flexible swords from their arms and shoulders.

villains.name: Leviathan
villains.quirk_description: Allows him to create a powerful water current twist from his fingertips and horns.
